title: How to appreciate every songs you hear - Quora

response.answer_text: By understanding that there are human beings with human emotions and passions behind each song (computer-generated compositions notwithstanding). For instance, I appreciate rap songs, not because I particularly like them (quite the opposite in most cases), but because I understand that it's not coming out of nowhere. Ditto John Cage's 4'33", though that took way more effort on my part as listener than his as performer.
